pr_title: Find a location to use for BattleCalculatorPanel even if one isn't selected

timeline.message: Find a location to use for BattleCalculatorPanel even if one isn't selected

timeline.bodyText: Should we remove this comment now that we have a method?
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: Any chance location will already be computed? Is the instance location attached to the class still used at all, or would it be better to get rid of that state and do more on-demand computing?
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

replies.bodyText:
Yes, location is already computed if you click on a territory and use the shortcut to open the battle calculator.  The way to get a null location is by opening it from the menu.
In the case where you are opening the battle calculator from a specific territory, we want to use that territory.  I believe the calculator utilizes territory attachments for its calculations so you'll get more accurate results.
replies.author: trevan
